divs: Sighting DetailsIT CAME FROM ABOVE THE CLOUDS THAT WERE BROKEN STRAIGHT DOWN STOPPED AND THEN MOVED TO THE NORTH EAST. IT WAS PARTLY CLOUDY AND IT STOPPED ABOUT 6,000 FEET. IT LOOKED SMALL AT THAT ALTITUDE. IF WAS AT ABOUT 5 MILES NE OF MY LOCATION.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hammond
There were no other sightings in Hammond on or around September 22nd 2013
Summary: IT WAS DEFINATELY A DISC SHAPE.
